titles.title: Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Amendments Act of 2000
Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Amendments Act of 2000
Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Amendments Act of 2000
To amend the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992 to clarify the areas included in the Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park and to authorize appropriations for that park.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 106-896.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 540.

action.text: Mr. Hansen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5036.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/26/2000--Passed House amended. Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Amendments Act of 2000 - Amends the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992 to: (1) add three properties for inclusion within the Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park; and (2) remove an appropriations limit with respect to the operation, development, or restoration of non-federally owned properties within such Park.
